elements.title: Respond to the multiple choice questions below on the client interviews and brièvement justifiez les solutions choisies. Several answers may be correct.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Generally speaking, what is the aim of a client service?
choices: Convaincre le client.
Intimider la cliente.
Mieux connaître le client.
Désorienter la cliente.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Justifiez votre réponse.
elements.correctAnswer: The purpose of client meetings is to convince the client of the service offered or to better understand it in order to recommend a more suitable product.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Respond to the multiple choice questions below on the client interviews and brièvement justifiez les solutions choisies. Several answers may be correct.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: For what reason is it important to scout actively when making a client appointment?
choices: Pour ne pas contredire le client.
Pour imposer son propre point de vue.
Pour comprendre les besoins de la cliente.
Pour interrompre le client au bon moment.
correctAnswer: Pour comprendre les besoins de la cliente.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Justifiez votre réponse.
elements.correctAnswer: A good consultation must allow us to better understand the client's needs.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Respond to the multiple choice questions below on the client interviews and brièvement justifiez les solutions choisies. Several answers may be correct.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What role does empathy play in the success of a client service?
choices: L'empathie ne doit pas avoir d'influence, sinon on a un parti pris.
Empathy is important for understanding the client's needs.
L'empathie n'est pas pertinente, seul le produit compte.
Empathy is only important for social encounters.
correctAnswer: Empathy is important for understanding the client's needs.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Justifiez votre réponse.
elements.correctAnswer: L'empathie contributes à se consacrer entièrement à la clientele.

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Respond to the multiple choice questions below on the client interviews and brièvement justifiez les solutions choisies. Several answers may be correct.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: How to best manage a client's objections?
choices: Les ignorer et passer au point suivant.
Convaincre le client que ses objections sont infondées.
Take the client's objections seriously and propose solutions.
Critiquer le client pour ses objections.
correctAnswer: Take the client's objections seriously and propose solutions.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Justifiez votre réponse.
elements.correctAnswer: It is absolutely essential to listen to the client's objections and find solutions.

elements.name: panel4
elements.title: Respond to the multiple choice questions below on the client interviews and brièvement justifiez les solutions choisies. Several answers may be correct.

elements.name: question9
elements.title: What is the difference between open and closed questions in a client meeting?
choices: During client meetings, it is important to ask open questions.
The open questions only elicit yes/no answers, the closed questions require detailed answers.
The open questions require detailed answers, the closed questions require only yes/no answers.
The open questions are reserved for informal meetings, the closed questions are reserved for formal meetings.
correctAnswer: During client meetings, it is important to ask open questions.
The open questions require detailed answers, the closed questions require only yes/no answers.

elements.name: question10
elements.title: Justifiez votre réponse.
elements.correctAnswer: By answering open questions, the client provides a lot of information that can help them to better understand their needs.

elements.name: panel5
elements.title: Respond to the multiple choice questions below on the client interviews and brièvement justifiez les solutions choisies. Several answers may be correct.

elements.name: question11
elements.title: Comment pouvez-vous instaurer la confiance dans un entretien client ?
choices: En ne communiquant pas des informations importantes.
By communicating honestly, transparently and reliably.
En critiquant le client.
En étant aimable et accessible.
correctAnswer: By communicating honestly, transparently and reliably.

elements.name: question12
elements.title: Justifiez votre réponse.
elements.correctAnswer: Open, sincere and friendly communication helps to build trust.
